overall_objectives: Scale to enterprise-level deployment, implement cutting-edge AI capabilities, enable multi-region and federated operations. Achieve Tier 3 success criteria: accuracy >95%, false positive rate <1%, throughput >1M packets/second, ROI 300% Year 1.

tasks.title: Advance to Tier 3 Deep Learning Models
tasks.description: Implement LSTM and Transformer models for sequence processing, advanced ensemble methods, and distributed training. Objectives: Achieve SOTA performance. Dependencies: Completion of Phase 2. Success metrics: Accuracy >95%, FPR <1%. Practical notes: Use GPU acceleration, optimize for real-time inference.
dependencies: Phase 2: Enhancement and Production Readiness tasks

tasks.title: Federated Learning Implementation
tasks.description: Develop federated learning framework for distributed model training across multiple sites, implement privacy-preserving techniques. Objectives: Enable collaborative learning without data sharing. Dependencies: Advance to Tier 3 Models. Success metrics: Federated model trained and validated. Practical notes: Use Flower or custom implementation, ensure differential privacy.
dependencies: Advance to Tier 3 Deep Learning Models

tasks.title: Hardware Acceleration Optimization
tasks.description: Optimize models for GPU/TPU, implement hardware-specific optimizations, set up edge computing capabilities. Objectives: Maximize throughput and reduce latency. Dependencies: Advance to Tier 3 Models. Success metrics: Throughput >1M pps, Latency <10ms. Practical notes: Use TensorRT, ONNX for optimization.
dependencies: Advance to Tier 3 Deep Learning Models

tasks.title: Multi-Region Deployment
tasks.description: Implement global, auto-scaling deployment with multi-region support, configure service mesh for inter-service communication. Objectives: Ensure high availability and global reach. Dependencies: Phase 2 Kubernetes Deployment. Success metrics: Multi-region failover tested. Practical notes: Use Istio or Linkerd, monitor cross-region latency.

tasks.title: Advanced Explainability Dashboard
tasks.description: Build comprehensive dashboard for model explanations, feature importance, and decision transparency. Objectives: Enhance trust and compliance. Dependencies: Advance to Tier 3 Models. Success metrics: Dashboard functional with real-time updates. Practical notes: Integrate SHAP, LIME, custom visualizations.
dependencies: Advance to Tier 3 Deep Learning Models

tasks.title: Continuous Ethics Monitoring
tasks.description: Implement automated ethics monitoring, bias detection, and fairness auditing with continuous feedback loops. Objectives: Maintain ethical AI practices. Dependencies: Phase 2 Compliance Framework. Success metrics: Quarterly audits automated. Practical notes: Use AIF360, integrate with monitoring stack.

tasks.title: Adversarial Robustness Testing
tasks.description: Develop adversarial attack simulations, implement defenses against evasion techniques, test robustness. Objectives: Ensure security against attacks. Dependencies: Advance to Tier 3 Models. Success metrics: Detection >80% against adversarial patterns. Practical notes: Use Foolbox or ART libraries, integrate with testing framework.
dependencies: Advance to Tier 3 Deep Learning Models

tasks.title: Commercial Features Integration
tasks.description: Add enterprise features like API rate limiting, multi-tenancy, integration with commercial SIEMs, and monetization capabilities. Objectives: Enable commercial deployment. Dependencies: Multi-Region Deployment. Success metrics: Commercial pilot successful. Practical notes: Implement billing, user management, enterprise APIs.

tasks.title: Full MLOps Pipeline Automation
tasks.description: Automate end-to-end MLOps with CI/CD for models, continuous training, and deployment pipelines. Objectives: Enable scalable operations. Dependencies: All Phase 3 tasks. Success metrics: Automated pipeline running. Practical notes: Use GitHub Actions, Jenkins, integrate with cloud MLOps platforms.

tasks.title: Final Validation and Scaling
tasks.description: Perform comprehensive testing at scale, validate against all success metrics, prepare for production handover. Objectives: Ensure system readiness. Dependencies: Full MLOps Pipeline. Success metrics: All Tier 3 criteria met. Practical notes: Load testing, security audits, documentation finalization.
